ing: 1 (4 pound) corned beef brisket with spice packet
22 fluid ounces IPA beer (such as LagunitasÂ® Wilco Tango Foxtrot)
des: "This by far has been my most successful corned beef recipe that I've done. Instead of using GuinnessÂ® or an American lager like most recipes call for, I used a hoppy Lagunitas Wilco Tango Foxtrot IPA which cooked some amazing flavors into the corned beef."
ins:
Coat corned beef with spicy brown mustard and place, fat-side down, into a slow cooker. Add garlic and seasoning packet to corned beef; pour in beer, covering beef completely.
Cook on Low for 8 hours. Remove corned beef from slow cooker and allow to rest for 15 minutes before slicing across the grain.
